trans-unit.source: Performs data binding of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl"></xref> Web server control within a visual designer.
trans-unit.target: 执行数据绑定的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl"> </xref> Web 服务器控件在可视化设计器中的。

trans-unit.source: The ListControlDataBindingHandler class performs design-time data binding of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> control.
trans-unit.target: ListControlDataBindingHandler 类执行的设计时数据绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>

trans-unit.source: The ListControlDataBindingHandler class is referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingHandlerAttribute> class.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDataBindingHandler.DataBindControl%2A> method performs the design-time data binding.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDataBindingHandler"></xref> class.

The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDataBindingHandler> class when the class is referenced by a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingHandlerAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 内部构造的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDataBindingHandler>类引用类时<xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingHandlerAttribute>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingHandlerAttribute> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDataBindingHandler>

trans-unit.source: Performs data binding on the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 指定控件上执行数据绑定。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> control that is specified by `control` has a data source specified within its <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataBindingsAccessor.DataBindings%2A> property, the DataBindControl method clears the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>, and then adds a string message indicating that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> is data bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>由指定的控件`control`具有数据源中指定其<xref:System.Web.UI.IDataBindingsAccessor.DataBindings%2A>属性，DataBindControl 方法清除<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>的集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>，然后添加字符串消息，指出<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>数据绑定到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.IDataBindingsAccessor.DataBindings%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> for the document that contains the control.
